verses.verse: Now <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> died, <S%H8439>Tola<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6312>Puah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1734>Dodo,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and he <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H8069>Shamir<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>
And he <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> twenty-three <S%H8141>years.<s%> Then he <S%H4191>died<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in <S%H8069>Shamir.<s%>

And he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> who <S%H7392>rode<s%> on <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H5895>donkeys,<s%> and they had <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> that are <S%H7121>called<s%> Havvoth-jair to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Then the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> the <S%H1168>Baals<s%> and the <S%H9441>Ashtaroth,<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H758>Aram,<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H6721>Sidon,<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines;<s%> thus they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and did not <S%H5647>serve<s%> Him.

And the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2734>burned<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and He <S%H4376>sold<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%>

And they <S%H7492>afflicted<s%> and <S%H7533>crushed<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H8141>year;<s%> for <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> they [afflicted] <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H5674>crossed<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> against <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> so that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H9503>distressed.<s%>

Then the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> out to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against Thee, for indeed, we have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> the <S%H1168>Baals.<s%>"

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "[Did I] not [deliver you] from the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>?

"Also when the <S%H6722>Sidonians,<s%> the <S%H6002>Amalekites<s%> and the <S%H4584>Maonites<s%> <S%H3905>oppressed<s%> you, you <S%H6817>cried<s%> out to Me, and I <S%H3467>delivered<s%> you from their <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
"Yet you have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> Me and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods;<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> I will <S%H3467>deliver<s%> you <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more.<s%>

<S%H1980>"Go<s%> and <S%H2199>cry<s%> out to the <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H977>chosen;<s%> let them <S%H3467>deliver<s%> you in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of your <S%H6869>distress.<s%>"

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "We have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to us <S%H3605>whatever<s%> seems <S%H2896>good<s%> to Thee; <S%H389>only<s%> <S%H4994>please<s%> <S%H5337>deliver<s%> us <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>"

So they <S%H5493>put<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> them, and <S%H5647>served<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and He <S%H9527>could<s%> <S%H9527>bear<s%> the <S%H5999>misery<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H9527>no<s%> <S%H9527>longer.<s%>

Then the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> were <S%H6817>summoned,<s%> and they <S%H2583>camped<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> together, and <S%H2583>camped<s%> in <S%H4709>Mizpah.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H8269>leaders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H7453>another,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> will <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>? He shall <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> over <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>"
